PrepHint.com is the place for free browser extensions that make your daily tasks easier. Whether you need to convert files or download YouTube thumbnails, PrepHint has the tools to help you. Our goal is to provide simple, easy-to-use tools without any cost or hassle.

img.alt: Aman Kumar - Founder and Creator of PreppHint

div.p: PrepHint was created and is run by Aman Kumar, a developer with a passion for making web apps and Chrome extensions that solve everyday problems. He also loves working on visual effects and 3D modeling, using tools like Blender and Unreal Engine to explore creative projects. His skills help PrepHint grow into a trusted place for online tools that are useful for everyone.

Right now, PrepHint has a bunch of different tools, the mission is simple: make tools that are free, easy to use, and accessible on any device - whether you're on a phone, tablet, or computer. Right now, the site offers a growing collection of practical tools, including Volume Master, Adblock for Youtube, Audio Capture, and other handy utilities for everyday tasks. Each tool is designed to be fast, minimal, and user-friendly, so you can get things done without dealing with complex settings.
Behind the scenes, PrepHint is constantly evolving with new features and tools. Stay tuned - this is just the beginning.

We're just getting started! In the future, we plan to add even more tools – everything from productivity boosters to creative resources. Our mission is to build a platform that covers a wide range of needs, all while staying completely free. Whether it's a file Converter, Adblocker, or QR Code Generator, PrepHint will be there for you.

PrepHint is more than just a bunch of tools – it's a community where your ideas matter. As we grow, we invite you to be part of the journey. Whether you're using our tools or sharing new ideas, you're helping to make PrepHint even better. Thanks for being part of the PrepHint community!

In the future, we plan to add different categories of online tools, making them easily accessible for everyone to use for free. If you have an idea for any online tool, or just want to report a problem, drop us a message on our Contact Us page.
